channel.title: Omscs on Ramesh's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Omscs on Ramesh's Blog

item.title: Georgia Tech's OMSCS Program
item.description: OMSCS is Georgia Tech’s Online Master’s Program in Computer Science. It is run fully online, generally taken up by working professionals. I enrolled into the program in Fall Semester (September - December) of 2018 thus completing one semester at the time of writing. Before I considered OMSCS I originally intended to apply to on-campus programs in the US, but I ended up skipping out multiple times First when my peers applied right out of their undergraduate program When my co-workers applied first year into their career and when they applied second year into their career Each time I kept thinking “I’m not going to procrastinate this year and apply”.
